headerDisplay: Full HomeKit support UniFi Protect devices. See the [homebridge-unifi-protect2](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-unifi-protect2) developer page for detailed documentation.
footerDisplay: A working **ffmpeg** installation is required for this plugin to work. For audio support, make sure your version of ffmpeg is compiled with support for **fdk-aac**.

address.title: Controller Address
address.description: Hostname or IP address of your UniFi Protect controller.

mqttTopic.title: MQTT Base Topic
mqttTopic.description: The base MQTT topic to publish to. Default: unifi/protect.

mqttUrl.title: MQTT Broker URL
mqttUrl.description: URL for the MQTT broker you'd like to publish event messages to. Default: None.

name.title: Controller Name
name.description: Name for this UniFi Protect controller to be used for logging purposes. password. Default: Defined by the controller.

password.title: Controller Password
password.description: UniFi Protect password for this controller. Creating a homebridge-specific local user is strongly encouraged for security and sanity.

refreshInterval.title: Controller Refresh Interval (seconds)
refreshInterval.description: Refresh interval to check for cameras that have been added or removed to a controller. For UCK Gen2+ devices only, this is also the interval used to check for motion events. Default: 5 seconds for UCK Gen2+, 10 seconds for UniFI OS.

username.title: Controller Username
username.description: UniFi Protect username for this controller. Creating a homebridge-specific local user is strongly encouraged for security and sanity.

items.description: Enter only one option per entry. See project page for the complete list of available options.

videoProcessor.title: Video Processor
videoProcessor.description: Location of ffmpeg or your preferred video processor. Default: builtin or in your local path.

ffmpegOptions.title: Custom ffmpeg command line options.
ffmpegOptions.description: Command line options to use for ffmpeg. Use with care. Default: see project page.

motionDuration.title: Motion Event Duration (seconds)
motionDuration.description: Duration of a single motion event. Setting this too low will potentially cause a lot of excess notifications. Default: 10.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: Enable additional debug logging for this plugin. This will create a lot of logging. Default: false.

items.description: Provide the IP address and login details of your UniFi Protect controllers.
These settings are optional. The defaults work well for almost everyone.
MQTT support will only be enabled if an MQTT broker URL is specified below.
Feature options allow you to further customize the behavior of this plugin such as the ability to show or hide cameras or specify stream quality.
These settings should be rarely used or needed by most people. Use these with caution.
